name: Jumper
description:
Jumper is a single player Frogger style game.

The game plays like most other games in this genre, take a group of frogs across roads, avoiding traffic, and a river to safety on the other side within a time limit. The game's own description sums it up nicely. As the game progresses it gets harder as diving turtles are introduced.

When the game is over there is no 'Game Over' screen nor is there a high score table, the player is taken straight back to the title screen

shot.caption: A game in progress. When all lives are lost the player is returned to the title screen. There is no high score table
